Name: BOY BEATS WORLD
About the game: For whoever reads this message: I'm looking for humans.... real humans. You know, the ones that have soul! Soultifity is the only thing that can save us right now. Can you help us? Features: Vibe to the music, missing a beat is okay Liberate the 7 districts and free colorful characters Defeat the robot leaders and unlock new moves Dance, loot and shop for new abilities Fear you don't have the right rhythm? Use freestyle mode!
